sentences.en: A pushed-in window indicated unlawful entry.
sentences.cn: 往里推开的窗户表明有人非法入内。

sentences.en: Discrimination on the grounds of sex or race is unlawful.
sentences.cn: 性别或年龄引起的歧视是违法的.

sentences.en: He claimed damages for unlawful eviction.
sentences.cn: 他要求对非法驱逐作出赔偿.

sentences.en: He was arrested for the unlawful possession of fire arms.
sentences.cn: 他因非法携带武器而被捕.

sentences.en: He was convicted of having unlawful sex with an underage girl.
sentences.cn: 他被判定与一名未成年少女发生非法性行为.

sentences.en: His hand was in every unlawful pie.
sentences.cn: 任何有利可图的非法勾当,他都要插一手.

sentences.en: It is now unlawful for factories to emit black smoke into the air.
sentences.cn: 工厂向大气中排放黑烟现在是违法的.

sentences.en: It is unjust and unlawful to discriminate against people of other races.
sentences.cn: 歧视外族人是不公正的,也是违法的.

sentences.en: It is unlawful for factories to emit black smoke into the air.
sentences.cn: 现在,工厂往空气中排黑烟是违法的.

sentences.en: It is unlawful to lend your vacuum cleaner to your next - door neighbor.
sentences.cn: 把吸尘器借给隔壁邻居是违法的.

sentences.en: It isn't unlawful, but it's morally wrong.
sentences.cn: 这事不算违法, 但在道德上是错误的.

sentences.en: The jury returned a verdict of unlawful killing.
sentences.cn: 陪审团作出了非法杀害的裁决。

sentences.en: The two police officers were accused of unlawful killing.
sentences.cn: 这两名警员被控非法杀人。

sentences.en: The unlawful possession of drugs is a serious crime.
sentences.cn: 非法拥有毒品是严重犯罪行为.

sentences.en: Therefore the Company does not exist any unlawful acts.
sentences.cn: 因此本公司不存在任何不合法行为.

sentences.en: What would she think of such wild, unlawful loving?
sentences.cn: 她对于这种任性而不合法的爱情会有什么想法 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 非法的,犯罪的,走私的,不正当的,被禁止的

trans.tran_cn: 非法的，违法的，不合法的，不正当的，私生的
